title: So apparently BFNA for a 7 day ban for saying, "I don't stick my [censored] in crazy."
body:
**BUT**

https://i.gyazo.com/4555deee3ce985a43941178da7ce5932.png

**IT'S**

https://i.gyazo.com/5f99fc83ec8f9904e0d093ab23d50f2a.png

**TOTALLY**

https://i.gyazo.com/b07f921662eb1bb40df458f344121825.png

**BANABLE**

https://i.gyazo.com/1fb0514e84dbdbb82720fd8760695368.png

**RIGHT?**


You mods done fucked up. You literally banned a fucking PILLAR of this community. BFNA doesn't harass people. He doesn't wish them cancer, he doesn't circlejerk, he doesn't spam, he doesn't do any of the reprehensible SHIT that gives you a fucking JOB.

"For all of maybe 30 minutes before i found out who she was; i dont stick my dick in crazy"

Really mods. Really? This isn't even a direct insult. On top of that, **this person was literally spamming the entire fucking boards and pissing everyone off.** You banned Ezreal Wright's smurf SUPER fucking quick, like 30 seconds flat. But this person? Naw, fuck it. Sure, mod bias doesn't exist. lol ok.
